item.title: 拉里-埃里森在甲骨文人工智能赌局中发号施令
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，布罗迪-福特（Brody Ford）和德雷克-贝内特（Drake Bennett）将为您报道拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）为使甲骨文重返科技界前沿所下的赌注。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 2026 年快餐连锁店应转向更小、更便宜的餐食
item.description: 在经济紧张的情况下，牺牲在所难免。厨房装修，推迟。家庭度假，缩减规模。放弃刚做好的泔水碗。【原文：In a strained economy, sacrifices will inevitably be made. Kitchen renovations, postponed. Family vacations, downscaled. Freshly prepared slop bowls, forsaken.】

item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行将在周五提高关键利率。前方的道路更加迷茫。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to raise its key rate on Friday. The path ahead gets murkier.】

item.title: 美国 2025 年最大规模 IPO 之路上，Medline 经受住了关税和延迟的考验
item.description: Medline Inc. 推迟已久的首次公开募股有望创下今年上市募集资金之最，因为热衷于这家医疗用品公司商业模式的投资者已经看淡了它重返公开市场的坎坷之路。【原文：Medline Inc.’s long-delayed initial public offering is on track to raise the most of any listing this year, as investors keen on the medical supply company’s business model look past its rocky path back to the public markets.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利债务排名攀升，成为人工智能领域的首选银行
item.description: 最近几个月，人们对人工智能泡沫的焦虑达到了白热化的程度，没有哪家华尔街银行能像摩根士丹利这样帮助这个行业冲破喧嚣。【原文：As anxiety over an artificial-intelligence bubble reached a fever pitch in recent months, no Wall Street bank helped the industry power past the noise like Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: Visa 使用 Circle 的 USDC 为美国银行提供稳定币结算服务
item.description: Visa 公司将向稳定币结算开放其美国网络，在特朗普第二届政府宽松的监管环境下，扩大与加密货币相关的产品和服务。【原文：Visa Inc. is opening its US network to stablecoin settlement, expanding crypto-linked products and services enabled by the relaxed regulatory environment under the second Trump administration.】

item.title: 基因编辑巨星联手开发更便宜的罕见病治疗方法
item.description: 基因编辑技术有可能治愈成千上万的罕见病患者。但是，这项获得诺贝尔奖的技术面临着一个基本的数学问题：花费数百万美元制造一种可能只能治疗一个人的药物是无利可图的。【原文：Gene editing has the potential to cure thousands of people suffering from devastating rare diseases. But the Nobel Prize-winning technology faces a basic math problem: It’s not profitable to spend millions of dollars making a drug that may only treat one person.】

item.title: 核电初创企业 Last 为建造小型反应堆融资 1 亿美元
item.description: 核电初创企业 Last Energy Inc. 从由 Astera 研究所牵头的投资者那里筹集了 1 亿美元，用于将其正在开发的小型反应堆商业化，因为人工智能运行对电力的需求急剧上升，激起了人们对该行业的兴趣。【原文：Last Energy Inc., a nuclear startup, raised $100 million from investors led by Astera Institute to commercialize a small reactor it’s developing as soaring demand for power to run artificial intelligence stokes interest in the industry.】

item.title: 菲律宾大亨将在审查中出售陷入困境的水务公司
item.description: 菲律宾第二富豪将把他的水务公司出售给一位同为富豪的人，退出这家受监管审查和客户投诉拖累的企业。【原文：The Philippines’ second-richest man is selling his water utility firm to a fellow tycoon, exiting a business weighed down by regulatory scrutiny and customer complaints.】

item.title: 摩洛哥世界杯体育场建造商在其交易首秀中一飞冲天
item.description: 摩洛哥最大的国际足联世界杯足球赛建筑商之一在早盘交易中大涨，此前该公司筹集了 50.4 亿迪拉姆（5.48 亿美元），用于为即将举行的世界杯足球赛建造巨型体育场和其他基础设施。【原文：One of Morocco’s largest builders for the FIFA World Cup surged in early trading, after it raised 5.04 billion dirhams ($548 million) to help construct a giant stadium and other infrastructure for the upcoming event.】

item.title: 瑞典经济部称，2026 年瑞典经济增长将几乎翻一番
item.description: 根据瑞典政府的预测，随着货币和财政刺激政策在2026年帮助重振家庭支出，瑞典经济将打破长达三年的近乎停滞状态。【原文：The Swedish economy is set to break a three-year spell of near-stagnation as monetary and fiscal stimulus help revive household spending in 2026, according to government forecast.】

item.title: 迫于西方压力，俄罗斯油价创开战以来新低
item.description: 由于制裁加深了该国石油业需要提供的折扣，基准期货价格暴跌，俄罗斯原油价格跌至乌克兰战争爆发以来的最低点。【原文：Russian crude prices are at their lowest since the war in Ukraine began, as sanctions deepen the discounts the nation’s oil industry needs to offer and benchmark futures tumble.】

item.title: 印度央行通过货币互换增加 50 亿美元流动性
item.description: 印度央行通过外汇掉期拍卖注资 50 亿美元，这是自 3 月份以来首次使用这一工具，因为贷款机构中出现了流动性紧张的迹象。【原文：India’s central bank injected $5 billion through a foreign-exchange swap auction, deploying the tool for the first time since March as signs of liquidity strain emerge among lenders.】

item.title: 金-卡戴珊和曲奇饼干在美国掀起 TikTok 实时购物热潮
item.description: 本月早些时候，金-卡戴珊（Kim Kardashian）登录 TikTok 做了一件新鲜事：试图像老式电视信息广告的主持人一样推销睡衣、拖鞋和配套运动套装。【原文：Kim Kardashian logged onto TikTok earlier this month and did something new: Tried to sell pajamas, slippers and matching sweat sets like the host of an old-fashioned TV infomercial.】

item.title: Performance Trust 聘请银行家领导英国结构性债务推进工作
item.description: Performance Trust Capital Partners 在欧洲设立了第一个办事处，并聘请了两名经验丰富的银行家，在创纪录的一年中努力扩大其抵押贷款债务和资产支持部门。【原文：Performance Trust Capital Partners launched its first office in Europe and hired two seasoned bankers as it seeks to expand its collateralized-loan obligations and asset-backed desks amid a record-setting year.】

item.title: 智利将因通胀前景恢复降息
item.description: 智利央行可能将于周二恢复降息，将基准利率下调四分之一个百分点，因为决策者们将抓住通胀前景改善的机会。【原文：Chile’s central bank will probably resume interest rate cuts on Tuesday, reducing its benchmark by a quarter-point as policymakers seize on an improving inflation outlook.】

item.title: 德意志银行称亚马逊交易标志着 RWE 数据中心的发薪日
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）周二在一份报告中称，RWE AG 已将其在英国的前煤炭工厂 Didcot A 出售给亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：RWE AG has sold its former UK coal plant Didcot A to Amazon.com Inc., and could reap a major windfall from similar deals ahead, Deutsche Bank AG said Tuesday in a note.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛分析师认为瑞银每股收益增长在银行中名列前茅，瑞银因此获得 "牛股 "称号
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）分析师称，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的每股收益将以全球所有银行中最快的速度连续增长。【原文：UBS Group AG is set to grow earnings per share at the fastest sequential pace of any bank globally, according to analysts at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 英国企业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示预算案后新订单激增
item.description: 一项调查显示，英国企业的新工作量出现了一年多来最大幅度的回升，这表明企业受到了预算案中数月来有关增税猜测的终结的鼓舞。【原文：British businesses enjoyed the sharpest pick-up in new work in more than a year, according to a survey that suggests firms were buoyed by an end to months of speculation around tax hikes in the budget.】

item.title: 韦丹塔获法院批准分拆业务，股价创历史新高
item.description: 亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）的韦丹塔有限公司（Vedanta Ltd.）已获得印度一家法院的批准，可以拆分这家庞大的企业集团，从而推动母公司减轻数十亿美元债务负担的努力。【原文：Billionaire Anil Agarwal’s Vedanta Ltd. has secured approval from an Indian court to break up the sprawling conglomerate, advancing efforts to reduce its multi-billion debt burden at the parent level.】

item.title: 什么是熊市？美银美林民调显示投资者对 2026 年普遍持乐观态度
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的月度民意调查显示，从经济增长到股票和大宗商品，资金经理们都将带着坚定的信心迎接新的一年。【原文：Money managers are set to ring in the new year with resounding confidence about everything from economic growth to equities and commodities, according to a monthly poll by Bank of America Corp.】
